LanguageData.Ammo_127x42mmB_FMJ.label: .50 Beowulf (FMJ)
LanguageData.Ammo_127x42mmB_FMJ.description: Specialized High Caliber bullet, intended to improve stopping power greatly at short to medium range as compared to the standard 5.56×45mm NATO round.
